alert.note: Alert for Concho; Kimble; Mason; McCulloch; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:40AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Schleicher, northwestern Kimble, southwestern McCulloch, Menard, northwestern Mason, south central Concho and eastern Sutton Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1040 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line to near Fort Mckavett to near Sonora. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Menard, Calf Creek, Hext, Roosevelt, Fort Mckavett, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1773, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864, Camp Sol Mayer, Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line, I-10 Near The Sutton-kKmble County Line, Us- 190 Near The Menard-Mcculloch County Line, Cleo, Us- 83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Highway 29. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 398 and 454. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Concho; Kimble; Mason; McCulloch; Menard; Schleicher; Sutton
